item.description: This band is awesome playing all the U2 favorites. Piper Beau's is a small restaurant and bar that has hosted this band a few times in the past and was a sell out each time the tickets are $10.00 and can be purchased there anytime before the show. This is one meet-up that you shouldn't miss and you will have a good time.
item.how_to_find_us: Text me at 508-958-2353 il be there inside.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Joshua Tree, the U2 tribute band playing at Piper Beau's in Wareham Ma
